trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> tipi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>rimane in memoria fino a quando l'oggetto associato <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>viene eliminato definitivamente.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: La stessa istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>viene restituito dalle chiamate successive a questo metodo e le chiamate a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo del peer è determinato dal <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>callback virtuale.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>non implementa il callback, non <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>viene creato, e questo metodo restituisce `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto creato <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> was not created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> non è stato creato dal <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tasto di scelta rapida per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>. Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave di accesso per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che identifica in modo univoco il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che rappresenta il rettangolo di delimitazione di <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the element.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> che contiene le coordinate dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>, this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, se l'elemento non sia un <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>, questo metodo restituisce <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio del <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: A list of child <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco di figlio <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> elementi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome di <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.String>stringa.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> che rappresenta lo spazio selezionabile che utilizza il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> sull'elemento che consente il clic.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: I valori dei punti sono (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) se l'elemento non sia un <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che descrive la funzionalità del <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: In genere, la stringa restituita è lo stesso testo che fornisce il controllo nella descrizione comando.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che comunica lo stato visivo del <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, lo stato di un contatto di messenger può essere "Occupato" o "Online".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un leggibile stringa che contiene l'elemento di tipo che il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Esempi di stringhe sono "Documento", "Email" e "Contact".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento di destinazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento come destinazione il <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>può essere un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, ma non deve essere.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: Se si tratta di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A>verrà automaticamente impostata il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A>anche la proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento di destinazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo di <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>funzioni di proprietà simile a una stringa di testo utilizzato dagli utenti per spiegare il controllo al quale fanno riferimento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che sia disponibile una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il <> </> *> restituito da <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è disposto in una direzione specifica.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Valore ricavato dall'enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the interface if patternInterface is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il interfaccia se patternInterface è ; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> ha attualmente lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento ha lo stato attivo di input dalla tastiera; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è un elemento che contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è un elemento inteso dall'utente finale come interattivo.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, l'utente potrebbe considerare il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> come parte della struttura logica del controllo nel [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> che contiene il valore di <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> può accettare lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento è attivabile da tastiera; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è fuori dallo schermo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà indica se l'elemento è visibile.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: In alcuni casi, un elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo, ma non è ancora visibile.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è visualizzato sullo schermo ma è nascosto da altri elementi, potrebbe non essere visibile.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In questo caso il metodo restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'elemento non viene visualizzato sullo schermo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> include contenuto protetto.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> è obbligatorio per il completamento di un form.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, if it's set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> che contiene il valore restituito da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, se è impostato; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Imposta lo stato attivo di input nel <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
